name: Celestial Clash
description:
CELESTIAL CLASH

You are one of the chosen gladiators to represent the stars, and with your chosen Zodiac signatures, you swore to become the strongest across the cosmos! Choose the best abilities, fight your friends, and knock them off the heavens to claim victory.

STILL IN DEVELOPMENT

Controls

  • W - Set up neutral light/sig
  • A - Move Left
  • S - Set up down light/sig
  • D - Move Right
  • Space - Jump
  • J - Light Attack
  • K - Signature Attack

How To Play

Create a lobby and invite friends using the room code. Select the abilities you would like to use in the fight. There are three directions of attacking: Neutral, Side, and Down. These directions are associated with different type of moves. Use these moves to knock your opponents off the stage!

Abilities

  • Neutral Signatures
    • Taurus: Jumping Head
    • Summon your inner bull, charging upwards in a maddening dash. Knock players up as you charge through.
    • Cancer: Claw Dive
    • Swing up with your crab claws, piercing through enemies. Once you're up, go back down slamming your enemies down into the ground

  • Down Signatures

    • Aquarius: Wave Barrier
    • Conjure a ball of water, throwing it down beneath you. When it hits a platform, a geyser of water is shot up, knocking players up!
    • Aries: Downward Head Slam
    • Slam your head to the ground, launching all players back with a fiery wave.
  • Side Signatures
    • Scorpio: Poison Sting
      • Bring your scorpion tail our and unleash a powerful sting in front of you. If you hit your opponent with the tip, stun them for a brief moment. Hit them with the bulk of the tail, and knock them back.
    • Pisces: Going Fishing
      • Summon a fish out of the water and send it forward. When it goes back into the water, a second fish comes flying out for one more attack.
